DEMO_214_MSG_010:
̂You defeated Bundold! I knew we'd be able to count on you!
ā
DEMO_214_MSG_020:
̂Now I can rest in eternal peace, inside my nostalgic house!
ā
DEMO_214_MSG_030:
̂I just wish there were some way to repay you... ah, that's it! Why don't I give you this sacred stone?
ā
DEMO_214_MSG_040: ̂This was originally a gift to me from Lucia... but I have a feeling it would be better off under your care.
DEMO_214_MSG_060: ̂You're following after Lucia, right? In that case, use this Transportation Device.
DEMO_214_MSG_070: ̂This device will take you right to the Grim Tundra. When you land, you should first visit Polar Park.
DEMO_214_MSG_080: ̂Polar Park is a rather large town, and is the perfect place to start searching for Lucia.
DEMO_214_MSG_090: ̂Now, go on ahead. Take care of yourself, ȁ!
